text: Absolute indications Sick sinus syndrome Symptomatic sinus bradycardia Tachycardia-bradycardia syndrome Atrial fibrillation with sinus node dysfunction Complete atrioventricular block (third-degree block) Chronotropic incompetence Prolonged QT syndrome Cardiac resynchronization therapy with biventricular pacing Relative indications Cardiomvobpathv (hvpertrophic or dilated)
